abstract: The situation highlights the fundamental challenge of policing big banks, even after the financial crisis.
snippet: The situation highlights the fundamental challenge of policing big banks, even after the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: After the financial crisis, regulators vowed to overhaul supervision of the nation’s largest banks.

headline.main: Regulators’ Shake-Up Seen as Missed Bid to Police JPMorgan
